name: Shrimp riding game - Playtest A
description:
First playtest to collect feedback on the basic controls of a planned game where you will ride a shrimp.

If you are using a controller:

Space bar -  X / A Button

L Shift: Square / X Button 

Enter: Start Button

Please let me know your feedback, specifically about the intuitivity of the control scheme, its difficulty, entertainment value and general thoughts.

A freelook camera and further features will be added at a later stage.

Twitter: SHWM DEV

shwm_dev@gmx.de

Feel free to follow my Twitter to keep up with development.

Thanks for your support!
